name: Pets' Pass
description:
Pets' Pass was made for the Extra Credits game jam 5 'Passage'.
In the game Dogs and cats a trying to pass through the yard but don't get along well... You must place arrows to guide them away from each other as they cross this passage.

Controls
Left click and drag left or right on a tile to make an arrow
Right click removes arrows you have limited removals which recharge over time
Space toggles pause and resets after game over

Source code:
https://github.com/qwerty3-14/DogCat
